name: Bouncylands | 2D Platformer Game
description:
Bouncylands - A 2D Platformer Game

Like it's normal in a platformer game, you have to master the levels. This game has a hard difference: It's hard balancing yourself. With this difficulty you can play the levels or the endless runner mode. Collect the coins and find the secrets in the levels to get achievements and the ability to buy new characters. 

Inputs: Walk right (D) / Walk left (A) / Jump (Space) / Flip, when you fell down (F)

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/JosiaJo

Trello: https://trello.com/b/2ohJDCqV/bouncylands-trello

Discord: https://www.discord.gg/EcQn5Jc (Spoken languages are german and english)

Twitter: https://twitter.com/leSmashie

Warning! The game is now in the Alpha Phase, that means, only people with an invite code can play it. Do you want an invite code? Join our discord and take part of the invite code giveaways.
